original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1131)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1131)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(139)@</color> 秒內對敵方全體產生盲目狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1131)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1131)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on enemies within its own range, and blindly blinds all enemies within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(139)@</color> seconds.
